item.title: About Us
item.description: Whitehall And Daingean Road Residents Association is a local community group set up for the residents of Whitehall and Daingean Road in Tullamore. The association has been in existence for over 30 years. It plays an important role in looking after the interests of residents. We arrange for the regular maintenance of the Whitehall estate while representing residents on any local issues that may impact the community. Location Map
